name: FSkeletalMeshBuildSettings
doc: Settings applied when building a mesh.

ThresholdPosition: Threshold use to decide if two vertex position are equal.
ThresholdTangentNormal: Threshold use to decide if two normal, tangents or bi-normals are equal.
ThresholdUV: Threshold use to decide if two UVs are equal.
MorphThresholdPosition: Threshold to compare vertex position equality when computing morph target deltas.
BoneInfluenceLimit:
The maximum number of bone influences to allow each vertex in this mesh to use.

If set higher than the limit determined by the project settings, it has no effect.

If set to 0, the value is taken from the DefaultBoneInfluenceLimit project setting.
bRecomputeNormals: If true, normals in the raw mesh are ignored and recomputed.
bRecomputeTangents: If true, tangents in the raw mesh are ignored and recomputed.
bUseMikkTSpace: If true, degenerate triangles will be removed.
bComputeWeightedNormals: If true, we will use the surface area and the corner angle of the triangle as a ratio when computing the normals.
bRemoveDegenerates: If true, degenerate triangles will be removed.
bUseHighPrecisionTangentBasis: If true, Tangents will be stored at 16 bit vs 8 bit precision.
bUseHighPrecisionSkinWeights: Use 16-bit precision for rendering skin weights, instead of 8-bit precision.
bUseFullPrecisionUVs: If true, UVs will be stored at full floating point precision.
bUseBackwardsCompatibleF16TruncUVs: If true, UVs will use backwards-compatible F16 conversion with truncation for legacy meshes.
